derivation: or (shortened) אֵלוֹן ; or אֵילֹן ; from H352 (אַיִל); oak-grove;
outline:
Elon = "terebinth, mighty"
  1. Hittite, father-in-law of Esau
  2. second son of Zebulun
  3. Zebulonite judge of Israel
  4. town in Dan
strongs_def: Elon, the name of a place in Palestine, and also of one Hittite, two Israelites
